title: PM Modi visits AIIMS to inquire about Atal Bihari Vajpayee's health
article_body: NEW DELHI: Prime Ministervisited the AIIMS this evening to enquire about the condition of former prime ministerwho is undergoing treatment there.There was no official update from the All India Institute of Medical Sciences, where a team of doctors is monitoring his condition.Modi reached the hospital at around 7.15 pm and spent about 50 minutes there.After Modi, Railway Minister Piyush Goyal and BJP MP Meenakshi Lekhi also paid a visit.Earlier in the evening, Union Textiles Ministerhad visited the hospital to check on Vajpayee.Vajpayee was admitted at the AIIMS on June 11 with a kidney tract infection,, low urine output and chest congestion.The 93-year-old Bharatiya Janata Party leader, a diabetic, has only one functional kidney.He had suffered a stroke in 2009 that weakened his cognitive abilities. Subsequently, he developed.
